doc:
Robert Young (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Young_(actor) 0 Robert George Young (February 22, 1907 – July 21, 1998) was an American film, television, and radio actor, best known for his leading roles as Jim Anderson, the father character in Father Knows Best (CBS, then NBC, then CBS again), and the physician Marcus Welby in Marcus Welby, M.D. (ABC). Robert_George_Young ( February_22_,_1907 – July_21_,_1998 ) was an_American_film , television , and radio_actor , best_known for his_leading_roles as Jim_Anderson , the_father_character in Father_Knows_Best ( CBS , then NBC , then CBS_again ) , and the_physician_Marcus_Welby in Marcus_Welby , M.D. ( ABC ) .
